channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: Martin falls in love with a period sandstone cottage in Shropshire, and the owner cements his love for his girlfriend at the end of the renovation by proposing. Elsewhere, Jacqui shows her appreciation, if not love, for a retro serving hatch in a flat in St Albans, and Dion loves the views of Burnley football ground from a semi-detached renovation project.
